author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I explain some of the security features of QubesOS and how you can combine it with a buskill laptop kill cord to get an even more secure browsing setup than TailsOS.

https://www.qubes-os.org/
https://www.buskill.in/

My merch is available at
https://based.win/
